title: Acupuncture & Herb Center
cleaned_text: -- A Family Team](#) TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE TCM refers to Traditional Chinese Medicine, which is a comprehensive health care system with about 5,000 years' continuous clinical experience. TCM employs different kinds of traditional healing resources which include herbal medicine, acupuncture, dietary therapy, Qi Gong, Tui Na (Chinese body work) and exercise, etc., to use the natural vital energy inherent within all living things to promote the body's ability to heal itself. TCM was practiced extensively over thousands of years of Chinese history and has contributed to the health of a quarter of the world's population that reside in China. Currently TCM is still a major part of the Chinese health care system, and is becoming more and more popular in the West. GOOD HEALTH IS YOUR MOST VALUABLE ASSET AND YOUR BEST
